snippet: The country’s Truth and Reconciliation Commission published a summary version of a report on the former policy of forcibly removing children from their families for schooling.
abstract: Canada's Truth and Reconciliation Commission reports country's former policy of forcibly removing aboriginal children from their families for schooling was 'cultural genocide;' documents widespread physical, cultural and sexual abuse at government-sponsored schools that indigenous children were forced to attend.
lead_paragraph: The country’s Truth and Reconciliation Commission published a summary version of a report on the former policy of forcibly removing children from their families for schooling.

headline.main: Canada’s Forced Schooling of Aboriginal Children Was ‘Cultural Genocide,’ Report Finds
headline.print_headline: Report Details ‘Cultural Genocide’ at Schools for Aboriginal Canadians
